item.description:
Jonathan M. Taylor Assoc. AIA, LEED AP of Goody Clancy invites young professionals to dream up what a BSA Young Professionals Network Committee could be on July 17 at 6:00 pm at The Architects Building (52 Broad St.).

Are you a young building industry professional? Interested in discussing/contributing to changes to the profession, the exam, idp etc...? Interested in creating programming, events, competitions? Participate in a conversation about what could become a formal YP committee on Emerging Professional issues.

Discuss details, brainstorm creative approaches, meet new people and generally live it up at this free event, which is, in true BSA fashion, open to all.

RSVP to bsa@architects.org by 9:30 am on the morning of the event.
item.name: YPNet Planning Meeting
